movies_collection.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies_collection.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

movies_collection.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies_collection.description: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

movies_collection.title: The Godfather
movies_collection.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

movies_collection.title: The Dark Knight
movies_collection.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies_collection.title: The Godfather Part II
movies_collection.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies_collection.title: 12 Angry Men
movies_collection.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

movies_collection.title: Schindler's List
movies_collection.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies_collection.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies_collection.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies_collection.title: Pulp Fiction
movies_collection.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies_collection.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies_collection.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies_collection.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
movies_collection.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies_collection.title: Forrest Gump
movies_collection.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies_collection.title: Fight Club
movies_collection.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies_collection.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies_collection.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies_collection.title: Inception
movies_collection.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

movies_collection.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies_collection.description: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

movies_collection.title: The Matrix
movies_collection.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

movies_collection.title: GoodFellas
movies_collection.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies_collection.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies_collection.description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

movies_collection.title: Se7en
movies_collection.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies_collection.title: Shichinin no samurai
movies_collection.description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

movies_collection.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies_collection.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies_collection.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies_collection.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies_collection.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies_collection.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies_collection.title: Cidade de Deus
movies_collection.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

movies_collection.title: Interstellar
movies_collection.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies_collection.title: La vita è bella
movies_collection.description: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

movies_collection.title: The Green Mile
movies_collection.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies_collection.title: Star Wars
movies_collection.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies_collection.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies_collection.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her 10-year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies_collection.title: Back to the Future
movies_collection.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

movies_collection.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
movies_collection.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies_collection.title: The Pianist
movies_collection.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies_collection.title: Psycho
movies_collection.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movies_collection.title: Gisaengchung
movies_collection.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies_collection.title: Léon
movies_collection.description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

movies_collection.title: The Lion King
movies_collection.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies_collection.title: Gladiator
movies_collection.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies_collection.title: American History X
movies_collection.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies_collection.title: The Departed
movies_collection.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies_collection.title: The Usual Suspects
movies_collection.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies_collection.title: The Prestige
movies_collection.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies_collection.title: Whiplash
movies_collection.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies_collection.title: Casablanca
movies_collection.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies_collection.title: Hotaru no haka
movies_collection.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

movies_collection.title: Intouchables
movies_collection.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies_collection.title: Memento
movies_collection.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies_collection.title: Django Unchained
movies_collection.description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

movies_collection.title: WALL·E
movies_collection.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies_collection.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies_collection.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies_collection.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies_collection.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies_collection.title: American Beauty
movies_collection.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies_collection.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movies_collection.description: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

movies_collection.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies_collection.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies_collection.title: Oldeuboi
movies_collection.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies_collection.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies_collection.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies_collection.title: Amadeus
movies_collection.description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

movies_collection.title: Coco
movies_collection.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies_collection.title: Toy Story
movies_collection.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

movies_collection.title: Joker
movies_collection.description: A mentally troubled stand-up comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

movies_collection.title: Braveheart
movies_collection.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies_collection.title: Das Boot
movies_collection.description: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

movies_collection.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies_collection.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies_collection.title: Mononoke-hime
movies_collection.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

movies_collection.title: Once Upon a Time in America
movies_collection.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies_collection.title: Good Will Hunting
movies_collection.description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

movies_collection.title: Kimi no na wa.
movies_collection.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

movies_collection.title: 3 Idiots
movies_collection.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

movies_collection.title: Singin' in the Rain
movies_collection.description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

movies_collection.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies_collection.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies_collection.title: Tengoku to jigoku
movies_collection.description: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

movies_collection.title: Toy Story 3
movies_collection.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies_collection.title: Capharnaüm
movies_collection.description: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

movies_collection.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies_collection.description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

movies_collection.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies_collection.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

movies_collection.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies_collection.description: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins - a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

movies_collection.title: Reservoir Dogs
movies_collection.description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies_collection.title: Idi i smotri
movies_collection.description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

movies_collection.title: Jagten
movies_collection.description: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

movies_collection.title: Citizen Kane
movies_collection.description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

movies_collection.title: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
movies_collection.description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

movies_collection.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movies_collection.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

movies_collection.title: North by Northwest
movies_collection.description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

movies_collection.title: Vertigo
movies_collection.description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

movies_collection.title: Ikiru
movies_collection.description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

movies_collection.title: The Apartment
movies_collection.description: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

movies_collection.title: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
movies_collection.description: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

movies_collection.title: A Clockwork Orange
movies_collection.description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

movies_collection.title: Double Indemnity
movies_collection.description: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

movies_collection.title: Hamilton
movies_collection.description: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

movies_collection.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies_collection.description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

movies_collection.title: Incendies
movies_collection.description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

movies_collection.title: Up
movies_collection.description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

movies_collection.title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
movies_collection.description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

movies_collection.title: Snatch
movies_collection.description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies_collection.title: Taare Zameen Par
movies_collection.description: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

movies_collection.title: Dangal
movies_collection.description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

movies_collection.title: Batman Begins
movies_collection.description: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies_collection.title: The Father
movies_collection.description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

movies_collection.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies_collection.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies_collection.title: Green Book
movies_collection.description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

movies_collection.title: El laberinto del fauno
movies_collection.description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies_collection.title: There Will Be Blood
movies_collection.description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

movies_collection.title: Shutter Island
movies_collection.description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies_collection.title: No Country for Old Men
movies_collection.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies_collection.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
movies_collection.description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

movies_collection.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies_collection.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

movies_collection.title: Finding Nemo
movies_collection.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies_collection.title: V for Vendetta
movies_collection.description: In a future British dystopian society, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow the tyrannical government - with the help of a young woman.

movies_collection.title: Inside Out
movies_collection.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

movies_collection.title: El secreto de sus ojos
movies_collection.description: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

movies_collection.title: Hauru no ugoku shiro
movies_collection.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

movies_collection.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
movies_collection.description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

movies_collection.title: Prisoners
movies_collection.description: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

movies_collection.title: Warrior
movies_collection.description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

movies_collection.title: Gran Torino
movies_collection.description: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

movies_collection.title: Catch Me If You Can
movies_collection.description: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

movies_collection.title: Million Dollar Baby
movies_collection.description: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

movies_collection.title: Klaus
movies_collection.description: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

movies_collection.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies_collection.description: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

movies_collection.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movies_collection.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

movies_collection.title: Gone Girl
movies_collection.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

movies_collection.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies_collection.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

movies_collection.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movies_collection.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movies_collection.title: Salinui chueok
movies_collection.description: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

movies_collection.title: Relatos salvajes
movies_collection.description: Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

movies_collection.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies_collection.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

movies_collection.title: Mary and Max.
movies_collection.description: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

movies_collection.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies_collection.description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

movies_collection.title: Room
movies_collection.description: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

movies_collection.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies_collection.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

movies_collection.title: Hotel Rwanda
movies_collection.description: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

movies_collection.title: Ford v Ferrari
movies_collection.description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

movies_collection.title: Ratatouille
movies_collection.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

movies_collection.title: Spotlight
movies_collection.description: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

movies_collection.title: Logan
movies_collection.description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

movies_collection.title: Rush
movies_collection.description: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
